author: Christhofer Natalius
comment: Best notes app I've ever had. Lightweight, online sync between mobile and desktop, dark theme, categorize notes. Covers all my needs.

author: rrcgat read
comment: It does what I exactly need.

author: Lopez Rodriguez
comment: Good App!

author: Ted Xiaolin Wei
comment: Simple and clean

author: Tushar Thakare
comment: 5 Stars, But a REQUEST. I've used every single app in this category. Simplicity and Faster sync than any other makes this one perfect. I've already dropped others for this. Just one REQUEST : *Add either checklists or simple lists (unordered) . That is so so needed as this is text only app. (We don't need images by the way, please be simple in future too)

reply.author: Automattic, Inc
reply.content: Thanks so much for the review! You can add lists. Type an asterisk or dash, then space, then your first list item. When you hit enter then next bullet point will appear.

author: Bennet Gikunoo
comment: Even though the programmers have not built in a word correction facility, I know it can be done by adding a dictionary file and reference engine. Its like a small website for your Notes. Thanks for this powerful app. I loved it. Go download it and use for school notes, official notes etc. You will also love. Best among many.

reply.author: Automattic, Inc
reply.content: Thanks so much for your review. It's great to hear you're enjoying the app.

author: Chris Zuber
comment: Great to finally have a notes app for Android and Linux! I've been wanting this for years, but everything else falls short. It even has decent markdown support.  Only 4 stars are possible for lack of widget.

author: Ed Lopategui
comment: Used to be great - then went cloud only.  Forced update wiped my local notes then required an account sign in.  If I wanted that I would have used EverNote.  Has no differentiation now, avoid.

author: Mateusz J. Nowak
comment: overall love the app but please please make it possible in settings to turn off the app's insistence on making hyperlinks, whenever I write a couple numbers anywhere it frustratingly makes them a link and I can't remove it!! also a fully black theme would be nice

author: Robert Hung
comment: Cross-platform note taking app that supports Markdown, great stuff! Not sure if it's a bug or forgotten feature but it doesn't seem to show tables. No problem with the desktop or web apps though!

author: Eric Secker
comment: It was great until I wrote a really long note, hit back twice to go to my home screen and then the note was gone forever. It was a new note so there was no restore option either. It would get 5 stars otherwise but a note app that loses notes is kind of worthless to me.

reply.author: Automattic, Inc
reply.content: Hi there! I'm sorry to hear about this. Did you check the trash? Try signing into our web app to see whether you can see it here - https://app.simplenote.com. Please contact us if you'd like us to have a look - https://simplenote.com/contact-us/

author: Rainy Day
comment: Easy to use, just like the name. And really simple for uploading. But, i hope next update, i could insert an image in my note when I'm uploading. Maybe, seems like a persnoal blog. But, some people maybe love it, cause it was so simple ^^~~ I'll give you 5 stars if i can insert image ♡

reply.author: Automattic, Inc
reply.content:
Thanks so much for the review. You can embed images with markdown, if that helps. This guide has more info: https://simplenote.com/help/#markdown
Feel free to get in touch if you have any questions https://simplenote.com/contact-us/

author: Laziz Rashidov
comment: Simple as it is. I really like this application because of cross platform support and simplicity. I like that it supports markdown feature, tags and fast search. But the reason I put 4 stars is that it doesn't support some features. Please add this features: 1) Fingerprint support on Android devices. 2) Add reminders to Notes. 3) Colorize note in the list view. 4) Add check boxes feature. I will really appreciate if you add this little features.

I love the simplicity of the app. However I'd love to see a basic checklist funcionality, e.g. for shopping lists. Another nice-to-have feature is a widget implementation to show note contents on the homescreen. Would be really nice.  EDIT: No Updates since April 2017? Is the app still in active development?

reply.author: Automattic, Inc
reply.content: Thanks for the suggestion! We would like to implement this functionality also and it's on our list of possible future enhancements to the app. I don't have an ETA I can give you but I've added your vote to the list.

author: Josh Javier
comment: True to its name. The most simple, minimal, yet fully functional notes app I've ever used, without the bloatware of Evernote. I use it as my default app for quickly recording random thoughts and rough drafts (you can turn on Markdown for individual notes - very handy feature). Highly recommended if you want a fast and simple notes app that doesn't get in the way of your thoughts.

reply.author: Automattic, Inc
reply.content: Thanks so much for reviewing the app!

author: Alexandros S.
comment: Only thing I can complain about is that I can't archive my notes. Other than that it's a really great and simple app.

author: Ramesh Joshi
comment: Two Things  1) There is no provision of "Title" of the file. 2) option of "Tag" is going out of screen.  * Is there provision for changing the folder or Tag?

author: Bernardo Domingues
comment: Concerned with PRIVACY. Now that the app forces users to sign up, why aren't notes encrypted while in storage? You state that it is so because the software can find our search terms, but security should be your top priority and we shouldn't settle for anything less.  Also, please let us change the default font to a monospaced one, such as Courier New. Then we would be able to create tables and paste code seamlessly.

reply.author: Automattic, Inc
reply.content: Thanks for the review! Notes are encrypted in transit which is when they're most vulnerable. However it's on our list of possible future enhancements to the app to encrypt in storage also and I've just added your vote to this list.

author: Hasi Haseeb
comment: Downloaded this app for an immediate note writing as my OS is stock android, unfortunately 'Registration' page defended me to taking note. No skip option as well. So uninstalling this app by putting a single star.

author: Nicholas Chavie
comment: Great service. If you enable markdown on a note, please make the hashtag used for nights title not appear in the sidebar.

author: karthik s
comment: The Best Note taking app. Clutter free and free of cost. The markdown features makes it an absolute pleasure to take notes. Accessible from anywhere smartphone browser & PC. It will be great if there's a floating tool bar to select the text and markdown.

Great note taking application that is the perfect alternative to Microsoft's OneNote. It is just as simple to use and is available on more platforms than OneNote which is very useful for someone like me who uses many different operating systems.

author: Riju Sarkar
comment: Great app..but one request..plz add a calender...then it will be used as a full fledged diary app..there is a great space available in between trash and settings..so put the calender there to quickly find notes..thanks

author: ranjit mane
comment: CHECKLIST IS REQUIRED and there should be functionality to ATTACH IMAGES....Best note taking app ever....hats off developer...good work...keep it up

reply.author: Automattic, Inc
reply.content: Thanks for the review! I agree - it would be great to have a checklist. You can currently embed images but not upload them. I've added both suggestions to our list of possible future enhancements to the app.

author: mahesh namechan
comment: Great app lets me transfer from my Samsung straight to my pc in know time I really appreciate this app thanks keep it up loving it best app out there I see works the way it suppose to thanks Simplenote

author: Marika McInDoe
comment: This app should be a Standard for what an app should be.   Initially, I was looking for a notepad equivalent tab when I stumbled upon simplenote.

reply.author: Automattic, Inc
reply.content: Thanks so much for the review! We're happy to hear you like it.

comment: Please keep this light n clean as it is now. Hope the UI wont be bogged down with excess features in the future.

author: Spencer Mathews
comment: Beautiful and clean. Lives up to it's name. Note history is nice, but precise timestamp would be better. Location awareness would be a valuable feature.

reply.author: Automattic, Inc
reply.content: Thanks for your review and the suggestion!

comment: hi guys. i think you have some troubles on android client app. it can't sync

reply.author: Automattic, Inc
reply.content: Hello! Simplenote is owned by Automattic which helps to pay the bills.

author: Aakar Jinwala
comment: I am using Simplenote on my Linux machine. It helps me syncing these notes and in viewing them on my cell devices. User Interface is also quite simple and elegant. Loved it

reply.author: Automattic, Inc
reply.content: Thanks so much for your review! We're very happy to hear you're enjoying the app.

author: I don't think that
comment: The best ! I've been searching this kind of app and finally found it. This is better than Gugel keeeep and not confusing. Simple. Perfect Thank you so much!

author: MIGUEL ANGEL
comment: Best sync out there. I wish there were some simple formatting options (bullet points, bold, italics...) without the pain to go through Markdown.

reply.author: Automattic, Inc
reply.content: Thanks so much for the review! I've noted your request.

author: Will Chapman
comment: It looks great but the use of each feature needs clarification - for example tags, how do you add a new item to an existing tag?

reply.author: Automattic, Inc
reply.content: Thanks for your review! You have to type the tag into the field at the very bottom of the new note. It will autocomplete with existing tags.

author: Scott Johnson
comment: Tried to add another note this morning with my laptop. The sign in URL is 404. I can still access my notes with my phone. I'll be going back to Keep now.
Just what l was looking. However l would like to know where you data is stored and encryption used.

author: Tan Dinh
comment: Syncing has become more reliable. It's a neat app and functions well.

author: Subhadip Layek
comment: Please add color for each type of tags, short intro of markdown would be great for new users reference. Thanks
Wish I could sign up for the beta. Says it's full. I like being able to support development and trying the latest features.

author: Nick Els
comment: Very easy to use and love the way it quickly sync's newly added data. Would love bullet point insertion.

author: 1 A.M.
comment: I love this app but its doesn't always sync and i wish there was a button I could mke it sync myself...

reply.author: Automattic, Inc
reply.content: Hello! Sorry to hear about the sync issues. Is the device online when the sync isn't working? If it's not working in online mode can you please get in touch with us at https://simplenote.com/contact-us/ ? Thanks!
